DOC.brief_summary: This trial 2 x 2 factorial design , double-blinded , randomize control trial evaluate efficacy safety remote ischemic preconditioning postconditioning patient undergoing coronary angioplasty .
DOC.brief_title: Single-cycle Remote Ischemic Preconditioning Postconditioning ( SCRIP ) Trial
DOC.criteria: Eligible percutaneous coronary intervention ( elective emergency case ) Age > 18yearold Informed consent Previous CABG Previous PCI 1 week / treatment thrombolysis within 30 day Peripheral arterial disease / AV shunt upper extremity ( AVF hemodialysis ) Paresis upper limb Unstable patient cardiogenic shock / vasopressor / IABP / cooling ( hypothermia ) Fatal cardiac arrhythmia ( VT / VF ) Chronic hypoxia
